scripts.docker:deploy:bot:demo: npm run docker:build:bot:demo && npm run docker:push:bot:demo
scripts.docker:push:bot:demo: export $(cat .env | grep MY_VPS_IP) && export $(cat .env | grep REGISTRY_PWD) && export $(cat .env | grep REGISTRY_USER) && export $(cat .env | grep REGISTRY_PORT) && docker login -u $REGISTRY_USER -p $REGISTRY_PWD $MY_VPS_IP:$REGISTRY_PORT && docker push $MY_VPS_IP:$REGISTRY_PORT/topa-bot-demo
scripts.docker:build:bot:demo: export $(cat .env | grep MY_VPS_IP) && export $(cat .env | grep REGISTRY_PORT) && npm run create:requirements:file && docker build --pull --no-cache -f dockerfiles/demo.bot.dockerfile -t $MY_VPS_IP:$REGISTRY_PORT/topa-bot-demo .
